description:

The post How to Clear Buffer and Cache Memory in Linux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Clear Buffer and Cache Memory in Linux

description:
A package manager is a tool that monitors the software installed on your computer, facilitating the installation of new applications, upgrading existing software to more recent versions, or removing previously installed programs. As the name indicates, a package manager manages packages, which are groups of files packaged together for installation and removal as a single […]

The post Debian Package Manager: Everything You Need to Know appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Debian Package Manager: Everything You Need to Know

description:

title: How to Install and Use NPX on Ubuntu (Ultimate Guide)
